contains.display: PhenX - posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD) protocol 121401
Have you ever experienced, witnessed, or otherwise been involved in any events that could have brought serious harm or even death to you or someone else [PhenX]
Specify, in general, what you have you ever experienced, witnessed, or otherwise been involved in any events that could have brought serious harm or even death to you or someone else [PhenX]
Did this event cause you to have intense feelings of fear, helplessness, or horror [PhenX]
If this event caused you to have intense feelings of fear, helplessness, or horror, specify [PhenX]
Have you ever been bothered by unwanted thoughts, or dreams, or images that kept coming back to you, about a traumatic event that you experienced or witnessed [PhenX]
Have you ever felt as if you were reliving some traumatic event that you experienced or witnessed [PhenX]
Have you ever been intensely distressed or extremely anxious when you were reminded in some way about a traumatic event that you experienced or witnessed [PhenX]
Have you tried in general to avoid thinking or talking about the event [PhenX]
Have you tried in general to avoid activities, places, or people that remind you of the event [PhenX]
Are you unable to recall important parts of the event [PhenX]
Since the event, do you tend to feel detached from other people [PhenX]
Since the event, have you been unable to experience a full range of feelings [PhenX]
Since the event, have you found yourself unable to see a future for yourself [PhenX]
Since this event happened, have you had problems with difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep, apart from depression or mania [PhenX]
Since this event happened, have you had problems with irritability or angry outbursts, apart from depression or mania [PhenX]
Since this event happened, have you had problems with difficulty concentrating, apart from depression or mania [PhenX]
Since this event happened, have you had problems with being too much on alert [PhenX]
Since this event happened, have you had problems with being too easily startled [PhenX]
Have you been very upset about having these symptoms [PhenX]
Have these symptoms interfered with your ability to work, to be with others, or to function in other areas of life [PhenX]
How long did these symptoms last [PhenX]
When did the traumatic event occur - if several, ask about the most closely associated with symptoms [Date and time] [PhenX]
Date and time of symptom onset
Age of onset of symptoms
Repeated disturbing memories, thoughts, or images of a stressful experience from the past in the last month [PCL-C]
Post traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) checklist - civilian version [PCL-C]
Repeated disturbing dreams of a stressful experience from the past in the last month [PCL-C]
Suddenly acting or feeling as if a stressful experience were happening again - as if you were reliving it - in the last month [PCL-C]
Feeling very upset when something reminded you of a stressful experience from the past in the last month [PCL-C]
Having physical reactions, heart pounding, trouble breathing or sweating, when something reminded you of a stressful experience from the past in the last month [PCL-C]
Avoid thinking about or talking about a stressful experience from the past or avoid having feelings related to it in the last month [PCL-C]
[PCL-C]
Trouble remembering important parts of a stressful experience from the past in the last month [PCL-C]
Loss of interest in things that you used to enjoy in the last month [PCL-C]
Feeling distant or cut off from other people in the last month [PCL-C]
Feeling emotionally numb or being unable to have loving feelings for those close to you in the last month [PCL-C]
Feeling as if your future will somehow be cut short in the last month [PCL-C]
Trouble falling or staying asleep in the last month [PCL-C]
Feeling irritable or having angry outbursts in the last month [PCL-C]
Having difficulty concentrating in the last month [PCL-C]
Being super alert or watchful on guard in the last month [PCL-C]
Feeling jumpy or easily startled in the last month [PCL-C]
I have nightmares or flashbacks in the last 2 weeks or more [M3]
I am jumpy or feel startled easily in the last 2 weeks or more [M3]
I avoid places that strongly remind me of a bad experience in the last 2 weeks or more [M3]
I feel dull, numb, or detached in the last 2 weeks or more [M3]
PTSD score [M3]
